data_description.instance_type:
**Normal**: Konfigurer en enkelt panelorientering (f.eks. Øst, Sør, Vest)
**Kumulativ**: Aggreger prognoser fra flere orienteringer til en enkelt total prognose

normal.title: Konfigurer enkelt orientering
normal.description: Konfigurer solcellepaneler for en enkelt orientering. Du kan markere denne instansen for å inkluderes i en kumulativ prognose.

data_description.modules_power: Total toppeffekt i watt for dine solcellepaneler
data_description.inverter_power: Kapasiteten til din vekselretter i watt (0 for ingen grense)
data_description.damping_morning: Justerer resultater om morgenen (0.0 = ingen demping, 1.0 = maks demping)
data_description.damping_evening: Justerer resultater om kvelden (0.0 = ingen demping, 1.0 = maks demping)
data_description.include_in_cumulative: Aktiver for å inkludere denne orienteringen i kumulative prognoseberegninger
data_description.name: Navngi denne instansen etter orientering (f.eks. 'Øst Paneler', 'Sør Paneler', 'Vest Paneler')

cumulative.title: Konfigurer kumulativ prognose
cumulative.description: Denne instansen vil aggregere prognoser fra alle orienteringer merket for kumulering. Den gir kombinerte produksjonsprognoser.

data.damping: Dempingsfaktor: justerer resultatene om morgenen og kvelden

energy_production_d2.name: Estimated energy production - day after tomorrow

energy_production_d3.name: Estimated energy production - 3 days from now

energy_production_d4.name: Estimated energy production - 4 days from now

energy_production_d5.name: Estimated energy production - 5 days from now

energy_production_d6.name: Estimated energy production - 6 days from now

energy_production_d7.name: Estimated energy production - 7 days from now
